name: Assassin's Creed Odyssey - Gameplay Remake
description:
The goal of this collaborative project was to reproduce some gameplay and visuals of Assassin's Creed Odyssey.

The player evolves near an enemy fortress, where he has to free captives, steal treasures and eliminate ennemies!

Using a gamepad is advised for a better experience.

Feel free to checkout my mate's ArtStation profile that made the visuals (lighting, FX, shaders...) : https://www.artstation.com/aurelienlm

KEYBOARD CONTROLS
  • ZQSD : Movement
  • Mouse : Camera movement
  • Spacebar : Dodge
  • Left shift : Parkour
  • Left click : Light attack
  • Left click + Left shift : Heavy attack (hold for super heavy attack) 
  • Right click : Open/Use ability
  • 1 : Spartan kick
  • 2 : Spartan rage
  • 3 : Poison
  • 5 : Heal
  • A : Parry
  • F : Assassinate / Interact (hold)
  • C : Crouch
  • R : Overpower attack
  • Middle click : Lock target (hold for eagle vision)
